author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: Clerk Jobs 2017 Recruitment (1500 Govt Vacancies Opening)
text:
Last Updated Monday, March 27, 2017 Advertisement 
Indian Citizens who are looking for Clerk posts in Government Sector, Get latest clerical jobs opening in this post. IndGovtJobs Website excursively provide Latest Clerical Cadre (Clerk) Govt Jobs 2016 and Upcoming Clerk Jobs 2017 List for Fresh Graduates and 10+2 Passed Job Seekers in this page. The page listing Clerk Jobs opening in Banking Sector, Clerk Jobs in State / Central Government Sectors, Clerk Jobs in Public Sectors (PSU), Government Enterprises and Govt underling Organizations. 
About: A Clerk post is a lower level White Collar Job. The post responsibility of doing General Office task works of record keeping, filing and other administrative tasks. 
Minimum Qualification: For Upper Division Clerk (UDC) Post - Bachelor’s Degree in any Discipline; For Lower Division Clerk (LDC) Post – Matriculation or 12th Class Pass. 
Pay Scale: Pay Band-1 ₹ 5200 - 20200/- with Grade Pay ₹ 1900 (for LDC) / ₹ 2400 (for UDC). 
Clerk Government Jobs 2017 Opening Vacancies List: [Last Updated on 27th March 2017 ) Govt Organization
